Sentencas: Various commercially available anode and cathode materials are investigated as the anode and cathode contact paste, respectively, for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Effects of ceramic based pastes on electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In order to obtain a printable paste, chosen materials are mixed with an organic vehicle and a thinner as well as a pore former.
Titulo: Effects of ceramic based pastes on electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The effect of the contact materials on the cell performance is evaluated experimentally via cell performance measurements by installing a short stack.
Titulo: Effects of ceramic based pastes on electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The pastes are brush painted on the corresponding interconnector and current collecting mesh.
Titulo: Effects of ceramic based pastes on electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A short stack without any contact paste is also tested for comparison as a base case.
Titulo: Effects of ceramic based pastes on electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The impedance and microstructural analyses are also performed through an impedance analyzer and a scanning electron microscope, respectively.
Titulo: Effects of ceramic based pastes on electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The effects of solid loading for two anode and two cathode contact paste materials which provide the best two performances during the electrochemical performance tests are also studied.
Titulo: Effects of ceramic based pastes on electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: After optimizing the solid loading in the anode and cathode contact paste according to the performance results, the best contact materials for each side are decided.
Titulo: Effects of ceramic based pastes on electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The final short stack is then installed by using the best combination of contact pastes and then tested.
Titulo: Effects of ceramic based pastes on electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The final cell shows 0.39 W cm(-2) and 0.90 W cm(-2) peak power densities at 700 degrees C and 800 degrees C, respectively, whereas the base cell provides only 0.26 W cm(-2) peak power density at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Effects of ceramic based pastes on electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The improvement in the cell performance is considered to be due to the enhanced contact and better current collecting by employing contact pastes.
Titulo: Effects of ceramic based pastes on electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells
Effects of ceramic based pastes on electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells
